name: BirdFood
description:
Help the red cardinal find the correct food, but make sure to not let it eat too much trash! Instructions:

Use the left & right arrow keys to move the cardinal across the ground!

Information on red cardinal diets used in this game can be found here:
https://www.thespruce.com/how-litter-hurts-birds-386484
https://www.birdsandblooms.com/birding/attracting-birds/six-ways-attract-cardinals/
